case.title: HELLO GENTLEMEN - 24
case.text:
Hello gentlemen, I am seeking a kind successful gentlemen for a live in relationship. If you are interested please reply with a picture of yourself and a little about yourself.
IF YOU DO NOT REPLY WITH A PIC AND A LITTLE INFO ABOUT YOU. I WILL NOT TAKE YOU SERIOUS!
THANK YOU GENTLEMEN SERIOUS REPLIES AND BUSINESS PROFESSIONALS!
